publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3363 Dr Elaine Murray: Work of the Canonbie Youth Group—That the Parliament congratulates the Canonbie Youth Group on receiving a Standing Up to Antisocial Behaviour award on 5 October 2005; welcomes the participation of two members of the group in the "Protecting Communities: The Antisocial Behaviour etc. (Scotland) Act one year on" conference on 3 October 2005; believes that the work of the group is an excellent example of young people empowering themselves to take a stance against anti-social behaviour by organising events for young people in the Canonbie and Langholm area; wishes the group well in its efforts to raise funds for an all-weather sports pitch for Canonbie, and applauds its involvement with Marie Curie Cancer Care in organising the planting of 26,000 daffodil bulbs to form a "Roadway of Hope" along the B6357 from Canonbie to Rowanburn on Saturday 8 October 2005.

S2M-3363 Dr Elaine Murray: Work of the Canonbie Youth Group—That the Parliament congratulates the Canonbie Youth Group on receiving a Standing Up to Antisocial Behaviour award on 5 October 2005; welcomes the participation of two members of the group in the “Protecting Communities: The Antisocial Behaviour etc. (Scotland) Act one year on” conference on 3 October 2005; believes that the work of the group is an excellent example of young people empowering themselves to take a stance against anti-social behaviour by organising events for young people in the Canonbie and Langholm area; wishes the group well in its efforts to raise funds for an all-weather sports pitch for Canonbie, and applauds its involvement with Marie Curie Cancer Care in organising the planting of 26,000 daffodil bulbs to form a “Roadway of Hope” along the B6357 from Canonbie to Rowanburn on Saturday 8 October 2005.

S2M-3363 Work of the Canonbie Youth Group (lodged on 29 September 2005) Chris Ballance*, Sarah Boyack*, Phil Gallie*, Robin Harper*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Maureen Macmillan*, Christine May*, Murray Tosh*, Frances Curran*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S2M-3363 Work of the Canonbie Youth Group (lodged on 29 September 2005) Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-3363 Work of the Canonbie Youth Group (lodged on 29 September 2005) Trish Godman*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*
S2M-3363 Work of the Canonbie Youth Group (lodged on 29 September 2005) Marilyn Livingstone*
S2M-3363 Work of the Canonbie Youth Group (lodged on 29 September 2005) Helen Eadie*
S2M-3363 Work of the Canonbie Youth Group (lodged on 29 September 2005) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-3363 Work of the Canonbie Youth Group (lodged on 29 September 2005) Elaine Smith*
